metadata.description: Career and professional development plugins for Claude

plugins.name: resume-coach
plugins.description: Resume and CV review, rewriting, and optimization for all document types: standard US, federal, academic, legal, medical, consulting, tech, executive, military transition, education, nonprofit, trades, creative, and EU/international formats. Detects AI writing patterns, calibrates analysis to document type and career level, and optimizes for the appropriate evaluation system (ATS, USAJOBS, committee review, etc.).

plugins.name: text-humanizer
plugins.description: Detect AI-written content and rewrite it to sound naturally human while preserving tone
